concept.title: Scenarios for configuring the resource adapter for inbound communication
concept.shortdesc: There are some basic, underlying tasks that are common to each of the following scenarios that are associated with configuring the resource adapter for inbound communication. The details for each task vary according to requirements. However, the following steps must be considered, understood, and completed to configure the resource adapter for inbound communication.

ol.li: Download and install the resource adapter.
Configure an endpoint and setup connection and messaging policy types.
Deploy and start your MDB if applicable.

conbody.p: The following topics provide more detailed information about parameters that you might want to consider when you configure the resource adapter for different scenarios.
